name: Crashing Skies
description:
Controller Required
Controls change between the Left Stick, Right Stick, and the front and rear shoulder buttons. Hard mode causes the controls to also swap between the Left Stick or D Pad and the Right Stick or Face buttons.
Control the Roll, Pitch, Yaw, and Thrust of the plane to keep it in the air.

Plane model from the Game Maker HQ Filebase

I wanted to make it so that the plane's flaps would react to player input but I couldn't figure it out in time :(
